channel.title: dnsmasq on 丸子有记
channel.description: Recent content in dnsmasq on 丸子有记

item.title: Alibaba Cloud PrivateZone+Bind9+Dnsmasq implements internal DNS
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Requirements: Alibaba Cloud cluster can resolve internal domain names Office network resolves internal domain names + office network Internet resolution Solution: For the first problem, use Alibaba Cloud PrivateZone for resolution For the second problem, configure the internal domain name zone in PrivateZone, and then synchronize it to the office network bind9 server through Alibaba Cloud synchronization tool; For the office network DNS resolution entry, use Dnsmasq to process, and
